channel.title: Need help with 508 please :)
channel.description:
Well, i'm back to Moparscape private servers.. i quit for long time.. And now i'm back i see there actually are 508 servers :), so i wanna try it, and downloaded 1.
Now the question is: how do i get it to run? and put my server online.. I got the client, but whenever i click run in cmd, it opens and closes automaticly, but offcourse, i have to add my server ip somewhere. Now if someone would please tell me where to fill that in, and say how it works, that would be nice :)
Greetz, Maxie35.

item.title: Need help with 508 please :)
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

go tony u own!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508 please :)
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Maxie35, post:7, topic:250525”]I’m using Phatt’s server & client, i thought his client would be a 508… but if it isnt…

Ill download the 1 u send me Thx.[/quote]
Well phatt’s retarded
And this client has an IP changer, so this is the client you need if you expect people to play your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508 please :)
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Maxie35, post:5, topic:250525”] thx, but now, i started server, and my no-ip, but whenever i log in to the client my server file says:

“Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1” <-- Which i think is correct…

But my Client says:

“Unexpected server response, please try using a different world” do u know what the problem is?[/quote]
127.0.0.1 is your localhost, that’s correct.
If your client says that, you aren’t using a 508.

They have a Designated client, you MUST use.
Link:
http://www.mediafire.com/?acd0b730n49

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508 please :)
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

well u run your server first at your server, click cmd, than right hand click run and edit it than change the jdk file to yours, than you need to download Rs2-Devolution 508 after downloading it go to files and look for compile if it doesn’t have it make one, than compile than go back to server,cmd,and this time clikc run, than click on Rs2-Devolution 508 and click run and there, now to get it online u need to port-forward it

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508 please :)
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Just make sure the path is set to your JDK, Then run the server before the client.

Read full topic
